item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:341741”]did you forget to type

“add model ####”

(the #### being all your model ids)
and then reloaded then client?[/quote]

Yeah, where do i do “add model” sorry if that sounds stupid, first time working with 317 models.

item.title: [317] Adding Models, What Did I Do Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Ok, so i added this into the client, in the folder Models

Then In Class8.java I added

} if(i == 11358) // Staff Of Light { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 11359; class8.anInt165 = 11360; class8.anInt200 = 11360; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 800; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 1300; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Staff of Light"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Humming with power.".getBytes(); }

When I compiled, and loaded client I got this

When I equiped, it is like little robes across my chest, obviously not the Staff Of Light. Did i forget something?

Thanks For Helping
-Emily

Read full topic
